links.title: Netflix now offers offline viewing
links.description: Netflix now offers offline viewing! In a few weeks, we'll be taking a road trip to Palm Springs. We've gone to Palm Springs for several years for weekend getaways. It's a family tradition during the holidays. Now the road trip will be a lot more enjoyable. Today Netflix announced that offline viewing is available.

links.title: Tesla Motors, Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA) Autopilot Turns Into a Lifesaver
links.description: Published By News Desk at December 15, 2016 08:59 am Tesla' Autopilot system has been under constant criticism after it was revealed that it was involved in the fatal car crash of Model S owner Joshua Brown. Since then, the company has been trying to bring in changes to its Autopilot feature to make it safer for its customers.
